if.test: startDate != null and startDate != '' and endDate != null and endDate != ''

mapper.select:
select a.XZQHDM as xzqhdm, (select d.name from sys_dict d where d.type = 'XZQHDM' and d.value = a.XZQHDM and d.value != '' and d.value is not null ) as xzqmc, count(JQ_TYWYSBM) as jqjbxxTjCount from jqxx_jbxx a where 1=1 and a.XZQHDM != '371300' and a.XZQHDM != '371301' and a.XZQHDM != ''
group by a.XZQHDM order by a.XZQHDM ;
